TopicTitle: Hold Space to turn off/on surface attach

Articles.Content:
this is a really simple thing to do, use space bar as a hotkey that, when held down, would turn off or on surface attach for a part.

it work like turning off the surface attach for, for example, docking ports and turning on surface attach for, for example, the SP+ crew tank...

the reset orientation function could be moved or kept in place if necessary

discuss below

probably would be made into a mod first but still
its already in place, while not the spacebar directly its the modifier key, for windows its Alt.

It's a new feature for 0.25. Press Alt while holding a part to disable surface attachment. For duplication, hold alt while clicking on a part.
